thread.title: Target.com: Apple Watch Series 1 w/ Sport Bands Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $269.99)
thread.title_full: Target.com: Apple Watch Series 1 w/ Sport Bands Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $269.99)

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Target.com: Apple Watch Series 1 w/ Sport Bands Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $269.99)
text:
Are you in the market for an Apple Watch?⌚️ Through 2/11, or while supplies last, Target.com is offering up $70 off select Apple Watches – Series 1 ! You can score the 38mm Apple Watch Series 1 Sport Bands for ONLY $199.99 shipped (regularly $269.99) and/or the 42mm Apple Watch Series 1 Sport Bands for ONLY $229.99 shipped (regularly $299.99).
And if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get an additional 5% off your purchases!
